advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted PDF file may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may cause an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Jeremy Brown working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected application termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected application termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Qi Sun and Robert Ai of Trend Micro

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted ZIP archive may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Ferdous Saljooki (@malwarezoo) and Jaron Bradley (@jbradley89) of Jamf Software, Mickey Jin (@patch1t)

advisories.impact: A malicious application may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks to prevent unauthorized actions.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in curl
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating to curl version 7.79.1.

advisories.impact: A user may send audio and video in a FaceTime call without knowing that they have done so
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Sonali Luthar of the University of Virginia, Michael Liao of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, Rohan Pahwa of Rutgers University, and Bao Nguyen of the University of Florida

advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Jack Dates of RET2 Systems, Inc.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: A memory consumption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged position may be able to perform a denial of service attack
advisories.description: A null pointer dereference was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in libarchive
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues existed in libarchive. These issues were addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to delete files for which it does not have permission
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

advisories.impact: A person with access to a Mac may be able to bypass Login Window
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to view the previous logged in user’s desktop from the fast user switching screen
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access information about a user's contacts
advisories.description: A privacy issue existed in the handling of Contact cards. This was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious app with root privileges may be able to modify the contents of system files
advisories.description: An issue in the handling of symlinks was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to read other applications' settings
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with additional permissions checks.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t), and Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) and Yuebin Sun (@yuebinsun2020) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: A plug-in may be able to inherit the application's permissions and access user data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted ZIP archive may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Ferdous Saljooki (@malwarezoo) and Jaron Bradley (@jbradley89) of Jamf Software, Mickey Jin (@patch1t)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improvements to the sandbox.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

cves.credit: Sudhakar Muthumani (@sudhakarmuthu04) of Primefort Private Limited, Khiem Tran

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to a device may be able to use Siri to obtain some location information from the lock screen
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Andrew Goldberg of the University of Texas at Austin, McCombs School of Business (linkedin.com/andrew-goldberg-/)

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to see sensitive information via keyboard suggestions
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating Vim.

advisories.impact: A user may be able to view restricted content from the lock screen
advisories.description: A lock screen issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.
